ValidationRule.description: Ensures that if the no subsegment option is selected, no other options are too.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: INCLUDES(Subsegment__c, "No sub-segment") && (INCLUDES(Subsegment__c, "Products in Trust (+ requirements to work with Trustees etc.)") || INCLUDES(Subsegment__c, "Power of attorney in place") || INCLUDES(Subsegment__c, "Business owners - with no future exit or sale expected") || INCLUDES(Subsegment__c, "Business owners - with future exit planned, or exit taking place") || INCLUDES(Subsegment__c, "Ultra-high net worth") || INCLUDES(Subsegment__c, "Vulnerable customers") || INCLUDES(Subsegment__c, "Conflict of interest customers") || INCLUDES(Subsegment__c, "No Capacity for Loss") || INCLUDES(Subsegment__c, "DB Transfer Advice"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If "No sub-segment" is chosen, you cannot choose any other values here.
